Major AI Developments.title: Delhi man critical after taking HIV preventive drugs on AI advice
Major AI Developments.summary: A Delhi man is in critical condition after taking HIV preventive drugs without a prescription, based on advice from an AI chatbot. The medication led to a rare and serious condition called Stevens-Johnson syndrome. The incident highlights the risks of relying on AI advice for medical decisions without consulting a healthcare professional.

AI Start-Up News.title: 1Buy.AI raises Rs 32.5 Cr in seed round led by 100Unicorns
AI Start-Up News.summary: 1Buy.AI, a procurement and cost-reduction platform, has raised Rs 32.5 crore in a seed funding round led by 100Unicorns. The funding round also saw participation from investors such as Ashish Kacholia, Gruhas, and FJ Labs. The fresh funds will be used to accelerate the development of the company's SaaS platforms and expand its global data pipes.
